description: Detects clearing or configuration of eventlogs using wevtutil, powershell and wmic. Might be used by ransomwares during the attack (seen by NotPetya and others).
author: Ecco
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
D3F7A5105
false_positives: Scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
name: Suspicious Eventlog Clear or Configuration Using Wevtutil
query: ((((process.executable.text:*\\wevtutil.exe AND process.command_line.text:(*clear\-log\ * OR *\ cl\ * OR *set\-log\ * OR *\ sl\ * OR *lfn\:*))) OR ((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line.text:(*Clear\-EventLog\ * OR *Remove\-EventLog\ * OR *Limit\-EventLog\ * OR *Clear\-WinEvent\ *))) OR ((process.executable.text:*\\wmic.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\ ClearEventLog\ *))) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable.text:("C:\Windows\SysWOW64\msiexec.exe" OR "C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe") AND process.command_line.text:*\ sl\ *))))
